meanings.definition: A recording of a book being read aloud.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy listening to an audiobook before bed.
meanings.sent2: She borrowed an audiobook from the library to listen to during her road trip.
meanings.sent3: The audiobook made the long car ride much more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: His voice in the audiobook painted vivid pictures in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The audiobook narrator's soothing voice put me to sleep.

meanings.definition: A book that is read aloud and recorded for listening.
meanings.sent1: The audiobook was a great companion during my daily walks.
meanings.sent2: They purchased an audiobook to listen to on their flight.
meanings.sent3: Listening to the audiobook felt like having a personal storyteller.
meanings.sent4: The audiobook brought the characters to life in my imagination.
meanings.sent5: I always have an audiobook ready for my commute.
